root.name: The Feeble Files
root.description: OverviewThe Feeble Files is a 2D sci-fi point and click adventure game from the makers of Simon The Sorcerer set in a galaxy run by the totalitarian regime of the OmniBrain. The OmniBrain runs every aspect of people's lives, who must take daily pills that subdue disobedience. The protagonist, Feeble works at a research laboratory and crashes his spaceship into the laboratory after having created crop-circles on planet Earth. For damaging company property, Feeble is sent to the prison planet Cygnus Alpha, where he accidentally gets involved with a resistance movement called the Freedom Fighters.The game features a rich, detailed alien society with a distinct Orwellian 1984 vibe.
